publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-777 Bashir Ahmad: Muslim Prayer Rooms in SPL Clubs—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Premier League football clubs for setting up special prayer rooms for Muslim players and fans; believes that, in including such vital services to cater for the needs of Scotland’s Muslim population, Scotland’s football clubs are taking the initiative for other recreational and leisure facilities to follow, and hopes that other services and facilities will continue to provide for the special needs of all faith and non-faith groups in Scotland.

S3M-777 Muslim Prayer Rooms in SPL Clubs (lodged on 5 November 2007) Alex Neil*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bob Doris*, Murdo Fraser*, Nanette Milne*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Christine Grahame*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-777 Muslim Prayer Rooms in SPL Clubs (lodged on 5 November 2007) Keith Brown*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-777 Muslim Prayer Rooms in SPL Clubs (lodged on 5 November 2007) Dave Thompson*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-777 Bashir Ahmad: Muslim Prayer Rooms in SPL Clubs—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Premier League football clubs for setting up special prayer rooms for Muslim players and fans; believes that, in including such vital services to cater for the needs of Scotland’s Muslim population, Scotland’s football clubs are taking the initiative for other recreational and leisure facilities to follow, and hopes that other services and facilities will continue to provide for the special needs of all faith and non-faith groups in Scotland. Supported by: Alex Neil, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Bob Doris, Murdo Fraser, Nanette Milne, Rob Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Christine Grahame, Joe FitzPatrick, Bill Kidd, Keith Brown, Robin Harper, Hugh Henry, Hugh O’Donnell, Dave Thompson, Gil Paterson, Michael Matheson*
S3M-777 Muslim Prayer Rooms in SPL Clubs (lodged on 5 November 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-777 Muslim Prayer Rooms in SPL Clubs (lodged on 5 November 2007) John Park*
